page.title: 01LANGHOLM
page.content: {LANGHOLM}IS A SMALL TOWN IN THE {DUMFRIES}AND{GALLOWAY}REGION OF {SCOTLAND}.IT IS SITUATED 22 MILES NORTH OF{CARLISLE}ON THE{A7},WHICH IS THE MAIN TOURIST ROUTE THROUGH THE{ {BORDERS}TO{EDINBURGH}.IT STANDS IN THE {ESK}VALLEY WHERE THE RIVER IS JOINED BY THE{EWES}AND{WAUCHOPE}.{ {LANGHOLM}IS ALSO CALLED "{THE MUCKLE {TOON}"WHICH ACTUALLY MEANS LARGE TOWN. THE NAME LANGHOLM MEANS LONG HOLM AND A HOLM IS A STRETCH OF FLAT LAND BESIDE A RIVER .LANGHOLM IS SURROUNED BY HILLS ,ONE OF WHICH IS TOPPED BY THE{MONUMENT}WHICH CAN BE SEEN FROM MANY MILES AWAY . ON THE FAR SIDE OF WHITA ARE TO BE FOUND{GROUSE MOORS. THE TOWN HAS A POPULATION OF{2600 {PEOPLE,}WHOSE MAIN SOURCE OF EMPLOYMENT IS THE LOCAL{WOOLLEN MILLS, UNEMPLOYMENT IS LOW. THE MAIN LOCAL EVENT IS THE {COMMON RIDING.
